title: Bryce Canyon National Park: Yellow Creek Campsite
body: Yellow Creek Campsite       This site is shaded by Pondersoa Pines, but has an open area just to the west where Yellow Creek provides a reliable water source. There are good views of the pink cliffs of the Claron Formation and the Yellow Cliffs of the Straight Cliffs Formation. This campsite is 5.5 miles (8.9 km) from the Bryce Point parking lot and 1.3 miles (2.1 km) from the Yellow Creek Group Campsite. Datum WGS 84, 37 35 05.2 N, 112 09 44.4 W.
